page.title: 02HOME LIFE IN DOUNE
page.content: My day begins when mum wakes me up at half past seven. I make my bed, put on my school uniform and then I have my breakfast of cornflakes and toast. After that I get my school bag ready and set off for school. I either walk or go in the car. When I arrive at school I play with my friends and when the bell rings at nine o'clock we line up. When the teacher comes into our classroom we stand up and say "Good Morning". Then we do some writing, sums, language and reading every day. At three thirty school finishes and when I get home I change into my outdoor clothes then do my homework. While mum is making the dinner I go outside to play and when dad comes in we eat. After watching T.V. for a short while I go to bed.
